summary: This is an email from an FBI forensic accountant in the New York Field Office, dated October 16, 2019, forwarding a summary of financial subpoenas served in the Epstein case. It appears to be internal communication regarding tracking subpoena compliance.

persons.name: Ori
persons.context: Addressed in the email's opening thanks, appears to be the primary recipient of the original message.

persons.name: Forensic Accountant FBI New York Field Office
persons.context: Author of the original email, who attached and served a summary of financial subpoenas related to the Epstein investigation.

connections.person1: Forensic Accountant FBI New York Field Office
connections.description: The forensic accountant is communicating with Ori, likely a colleague or supervisor, regarding the status of financial subpoenas in the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Financial Subpoena Summary Sent
events.description: An FBI forensic accountant serves and forwards a summary of financial subpoenas related to the Epstein investigation.
personsInvolved: Forensic Accountant FBI New York Field Office

keyFacts: An FBI forensic accountant was actively serving financial subpoenas in the Epstein investigation as of October 2019.
The FBI New York Field Office was tracking compliance with financial subpoenas.
The document indicates ongoing financial investigation into Epstein's affairs after his death in August 2019.
